TextView.android:text:
Mine Finder is a simple game. The only objective is to find all the mines on the board. The mines are hidden behind blocks though so you have to figure out where they are hidden. If you click a block it scans vertically and horizontally to find mines. If you clik a block and find a mine it does not scan. If you click a mine already found it scans.You can choose a prefered board size and how many mines you want on the board in the configure location.
